scripts.build:mainnet: pnpm run prepare:mainnet && graph codegen && graph build --network mainnet
scripts.create:local:mainnet: pnpm prepare:mainnet && pnpm codegen && pnpm build && graph create --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 summer/rates
scripts.create:local:arbitrum: pnpm prepare:arbitrum && pnpm codegen && pnpm build && graph create --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 summer/rates
scripts.deploy:staging: graph create  --node https://graph-rpc.staging.summer.fi/ summer/rates && pnpm codegen && graph deploy --node https://graph-rpc.staging.summer.fi/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --version-label $(git rev-parse HEAD) summer/rates
scripts.deploy:hosted:mainnet: pnpm prepare:mainnet && pnpm codegen && graph deploy --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ summer/rates
scripts.deploy:local:mainnet: pnpm prepare:mainnet && pnpm codegen && graph deploy --debug ---ipfs http://127.0.0.1:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 --version-label $(git rev-parse HEAD) summer/rates
scripts.deploy:mainnet:prod: pnpm prepare:mainnet && pnpm codegen && graph deploy --debug --node https://graph-rpc.summer.fi/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --version-label $(git rev-parse HEAD) summer/rates
scripts.deploy:arbitrum:alchemy: bash -c 'source ../../.env && pnpm prepare:arbitrum && graph deploy rates-arbitrum --version-label $npm_package_version --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key $DEPLOY_KEY --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz'
scripts.deploy:mainnet:alchemy: bash -c 'source ../../.env && pnpm prepare:mainnet && graph deploy rates --version-label $npm_package_version --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key $DEPLOY_KEY --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz'
scripts.deploy:base:alchemy: bash -c 'source ../../.env && pnpm prepare:base && graph deploy rates-base --version-label $npm_package_version --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key $DEPLOY_KEY --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz'
scripts.deploy:optimism:alchemy: bash -c 'source ../../.env && pnpm prepare:optimism && graph deploy rates-optimism --version-label $npm_package_version --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key $DEPLOY_KEY --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz'
scripts.deploy:alchemy:all: pnpm deploy:mainnet:alchemy && pnpm deploy:arbitrum:alchemy && pnpm deploy:base:alchemy && pnpm deploy:optimism:alchemy
